nodes.text: The Phantom Bandits were a group of bandits that operated on the planet Mustafar. Their primary weapons were kinetic-blast rifles and Mustafar bandit swords. Their criminal activities ranged from robbery, and smuggling to murder, and assassination. It is said that they would often attack the Blackguard, and the Blackguard would often do the same to them.

The Phantoms Bandits appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
